document_id.description: The identifier of the Document to retrieve.

$block: Increase generates certain documents / forms automatically for your application; they can be listed here. Currently the only supported document type is IRS Form 1099-INT.

$ul: **created_at**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) time at which the Document was created.
**entity_id**: The identifier of the Entity the document was generated for.
**file_id**: The identifier of the File containing the Document's contents.
**type**: A constant representing the object's type. For this resource it will always be `document`.
